location.en: 63A Bonham Road, Mid-Levels West, Hong Kong

description.zh-cn: 位于香港西半山的官立男子中学，为香港名校之一。其般咸道校舍是香港现存历史最悠久的官立中学校舍，已被评为法定古迹。
description.en: A government-run boys' secondary school in Mid-Levels West, Hong Kong, known as one of the city's prestigious schools. Its Bonham Road campus is the oldest surviving government school building in Hong Kong and has been declared a statutory monument.

description.zh-cn: 英皇书院的前身，于1857年成立，1872年更名为西营盘官学堂。
description.en: The predecessor of King's College, established in 1857 and renamed Saiyingpun School in 1872.

description.zh-cn: 英皇书院的前身，由西角官学堂于1872年更名而来，1922年再更名为英皇书院。
description.en: The predecessor of King's College, renamed from West Point School in 1872, and renamed again to King's College in 1922.

description.zh-cn: 第16任香港总督，倡议成立英皇书院。
description.en: The 16th Governor of Hong Kong, who proposed the establishment of King's College.

description.zh-cn: 香港议员，倡议拨款兴建西营盘官学堂新校舍，该校舍后来成为英皇书院。
description.en: A member of the Legislative Council of Hong Kong, who advocated for funding to build a new campus for Saiyingpun School, which later became King's College.

description.zh-cn: 香港上海汇丰银行董事局主席，倡议兴建英皇书院新校舍。
description.en: Chairman of the Board of Directors of HSBC, who advocated for the construction of a new campus for King's College.

description.zh-cn: 英皇书院创校人之一及首任掌院。二战时蒙邓公伯裘及邓公炜堂营救。
description.en: One of the founders and the first Headmaster of King's College. He was rescued by Tang Pak-kau and Tang Wai-tong during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 香港总督，主持了英皇书院般咸道校舍的开幕典礼。
description.en: Governor of Hong Kong who presided over the opening ceremony of the King's College Bonham Road campus.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间的战役，导致香港沦陷，英皇书院运作中断，校舍被征用和损坏。
description.en: A battle during World War II that led to the fall of Hong Kong, interrupting the operations of King's College and causing its campus to be commandeered and damaged.

description.zh-cn: 香港在二战期间被日军占领的时期。英皇书院校舍被日军占用为马厩。
description.en: The period when Hong Kong was occupied by the Imperial Japanese Army during WWII. The King's College campus was used as a stable by the Japanese army.

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区政府的决策局之一，负责香港的教育事务，是英皇书院的办学团体。
description.en: One of the policy bureaus of the Hong Kong SAR Government, responsible for education matters in Hong Kong. It is the sponsoring body of King's College.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，曾任香港特别行政区行政长官，现任全国政协副主席。毕业于英皇书院。
description.en: Hong Kong politician, former Chief Executive of the HKSAR, and current Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee. He is an alumnus of King's College.

description.zh-cn: 香港法律界人士，香港首位华人高等法院按察司。毕业于英皇书院。
description.en: A prominent figure in Hong Kong's legal field, he was the first Chinese Justice of the High Court. He is an alumnus of King's College.

description.zh-cn: 香港政界元老，曾任行政局及立法局首席非官守议员。曾就读于英皇书院。
description.en: A veteran Hong Kong politician who served as the Senior Unofficial Member of both the Executive and Legislative Councils. He studied at King's College.

description.zh-cn: 腾讯公司总裁及执行董事，1990年香港中学会考9优状元。毕业于英皇书院。
description.en: President and Executive Director of Tencent. He was a 9A scholar in the 1990 HKCEE. He is an alumnus of King's College.

description.zh-cn: 前香港天文台台长，毕业于英皇书院。
description.en: Former Director of the Hong Kong Observatory, an alumnus of King's College.

description.zh-cn: 香港的一所中学，创校初期（1951-1955年）曾借用英皇书院的校舍。
description.en: A secondary school in Hong Kong that used the campus of King's College during its early years (1951-1955).

description.zh-cn: 香港已停办的师范学院，其附属学校曾借用英皇书院的校舍。
description.en: A defunct college of education in Hong Kong. Its affiliated school once used the campus of King's College.

description.zh-cn: 香港已停办的师范学院，创校初期曾借用英皇书院的校舍。
description.en: A defunct college of education in Hong Kong that used the campus of King's College in its early days.

description.zh-cn: 香港早期的官立中学，英皇书院继承了其八年学制。
description.en: An early government secondary school in Hong Kong, from which King's College inherited its eight-year academic system.

description.zh-cn: 英皇书院首位华人校长，亦是该校的旧生。
description.en: The first Chinese Principal of King's College, and also an alumnus of the school.

description.zh-cn: 新界邓氏成员，二战期间营救了英皇书院首任掌院莫理士。
description.en: A member of the Tang Clan in the New Territories, who rescued Alfred Morris, the first Headmaster of King's College, during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 新界乡议局发起人，二战期间营救了英皇书院首任掌院莫理士。
description.en: An initiator of the Heung Yee Kuk, who rescued Alfred Morris, the first Headmaster of King's College, during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 西角官学堂是英皇书院的最早前身。
description.en: West Point School was the earliest predecessor of King's College.

description.zh-cn: 西营盘官学堂是英皇书院的直接前身，于1922年更名为英皇书院。
description.en: Saiyingpun School was the direct predecessor of King's College, and was renamed King's College in 1922.

description.zh-cn: 1920年，时任港督司徒拔倡议成立英皇书院。
description.en: In 1920, Governor Reginald Edward Stubbs proposed the establishment of King's College.

description.zh-cn: 普乐于1917年倡议拨款兴建西营盘官学堂新校舍，该校舍后来成为英皇书院。
description.en: In 1917, Henry Pollock proposed funding for a new campus for Saiyingpun School, which later became King's College.

description.zh-cn: 何理玉于1918年再度倡议兴建西营盘官学堂新校舍，该校舍后来成为英皇书院。
description.en: In 1918, E. V. D. Parr once again advocated for the construction of a new campus for Saiyingpun School, which later became King's College.

description.zh-cn: 莫理士是英皇书院的创办人之一，并于1927年成为首任掌院。
description.en: Alfred Morris was one of the founders of King's College and became its first Headmaster in 1927.

description.zh-cn: 英皇书院是隶属于香港教育局的官立中学。
description.en: King's College is a government secondary school under the Education Bureau of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 英皇书院于1928年起改用中央书院的八年学制。
description.en: Starting from 1928, King's College adopted the eight-year academic system from The Central School.

description.zh-cn: 时任总督金文泰爵士主持了英皇书院般咸道校舍的开幕典礼。
description.en: Governor Sir Cecil Clementi presided over the opening ceremony of the King's College Bonham Road campus.

description.zh-cn: 因香港保卫战，英皇书院运作中断，校舍被征用作救护站。
description.en: Due to the Battle of Hong Kong, the operations of King's College were suspended, and its campus was used as a first-aid station.

description.zh-cn: 在香港日占时期，英皇书院校舍被日军占用为饲养军用骡马的马厩，导致学校停办。
description.en: During the Japanese occupation of Hong Kong, the King's College campus was used by the Japanese army as a stable for military mules and horses, leading to the school's closure.

description.zh-cn: 1951至1955年，英皇书院校舍被政府用作开办伊利沙伯中学。
description.en: From 1951 to 1955, the King's College campus was used by the government to establish Queen Elizabeth School.

description.zh-cn: 罗富国师范学院附属学校曾使用英皇书院般咸道校舍授课。
description.en: The affiliated school of Northcote College of Education once used the King's College Bonham Road campus for teaching.

description.zh-cn: 葛量洪教育学院创校时曾借用英皇书院般咸道校舍礼堂。
description.en: Grantham College of Education used the hall of the King's College Bonham Road campus when it was founded.

description.zh-cn: 梁振英是英皇书院校友。
description.en: Leung Chun-ying is an alumnus of King's College.

description.zh-cn: 李福善毕业于英皇书院。
description.en: Li Fook-sean graduated from King's College.

description.zh-cn: 钟士元曾就读于英皇书院。
description.en: Chung Sze-yuen studied at King's College.

description.zh-cn: 刘炽平是英皇书院校友。
description.en: Martin Lau is an alumnus of King's College.

description.zh-cn: 林超英是英皇书院校友。
description.en: Lam Chiu-ying is an alumnus of King's College.

description.zh-cn: 莫理士于1927年成为英皇书院首任掌院。
description.en: Alfred Morris became the first Headmaster of King's College in 1927.

description.zh-cn: 梁鳯岐是英皇书院首位华人校长。
description.en: F. K. Leung was the first Chinese Principal of King's College.

description.zh-cn: 梁鳯岐是西营盘官学堂及英皇书院的旧生。
description.en: F. K. Leung was an alumnus of Saiyingpun School and King's College.

description.zh-cn: 二战期间，邓公伯裘营救及担保了时任英皇书院掌院莫理士。
description.en: During World War II, Tang Pak-kau rescued and vouched for Alfred Morris, then Headmaster of King's College.

description.zh-cn: 二战期间，邓公炜堂营救及担保了时任英皇书院掌院莫理士。
description.en: During World War II, Tang Wai-tong rescued and vouched for Alfred Morris, then Headmaster of King's College.
